data.persona: I am an intruder of the kingdom. I rob for a living. I have killed many men.
data.description:
You are in the Treasure Cavern.
Glittering as far as the eye can see the Treasure Cavern is filled with gold, silver, precious gems, and other priceless items. The stacks and stacks of gold plates, goblets, and coins tip precariously from side to side and threaten to fall and cause a landslide of treasures.
There's a plate, a silver, a coin, an ancient relic, a gold, a goblets, and a precious gem here.
The bodyguard is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a dark clothing, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I will follow the bodyguard so that I can hit him.
data.mid_motivation: When the bodyguard is knocked out, I will steal the treasure in the Treasure Cavern.
data.long_motivation: I will sell the treasure for many gold pieces and retire in a far away kingdom.
